testsuite.name: MIS Leave Management > View Request Status

testcase.name: Navigate to Leave Management > View Request Status tab > Change Request
Verify Date Range field is present for Change Request
Enter Invalid Date Range for Change Request
Enter Valid Date Range for Change Request
Click on Export Options Option for Change Request
Click on Print Option for Change Request
Click on Copy Option for Change Request
Click on Excel Option for Change Request
Verify PDF option for Change Request
Navigate to Leave Management > View Request Status tab > Comp Off
Verify Date Range field is present for Comp Off Tab
Enter Invalid Date Range for Comp Off Tab
Enter Valid Date Range for Comp Off Tab
Click on Export Options Option for Comp Off Tab
Click on Print Option for Comp Off Tab
Click on Copy Option for Comp Off Tab
Click on Excel Option for Comp Off Tab
Verify PDF option for Comp Off Tab
Enter Comp Off Period Name in Search Box for Comp Off Tab
Sort columns for Comp Off Tab
Expand Details of Comp Off
Navigate to Leave Management > View Request Status tab > Leave Tab
Verify Date Range field is present for Leave Tab
Enter Invalid Date Range for Leave Tab
Enter Valid Date Range for Leave Tab
Verify Export Options for Leave Tab
Click on Print Option for Leave Tab
Click on Excel Option for Leave Tab
Click on Copy Option for Leave Tab
Verify PDF option for Leave Tab
Verify Number of Entries displayed for Leave Tab
Enter Leave Period Name in Search Box for Leave Tab
Sort columns for Leave Tab
Page Next for Leave Tab
Page Previous for Leave Tab
Cancel Leave for Leave Tab
Navigate to Leave Management > View Request Status tab > Out Duty/Tour
Verify Date Range field is present for Out Duty/Tour
Enter Invalid Date Range for Out Duty/Tour
Enter Valid Date Range for Out Duty/Tour
Click on Export Options Option for Out Duty/Tour
Click on Print Option for Out Duty/Tour
Click on Copy Option for Out Duty/Tour
Click on Excel Option for Out Duty/Tour
Verify PDF option for Out Duty/Tour
Sort columns for Out Duty/Tour
Enter Out Duty/Tour Period in Search Box for Out Duty/Tour
Verify Data is present for Out Duty/Tour
Click on View button for Out Duty/Tour
Verify Date in View Window for Out Duty/Tour
Search in View Window for Out Duty/Tour
Navigate to Leave Management > View Request Status tab > Work From Home
Verify Date Range field is present for WFH Tab
Enter Invalid Date Range for WFH Tab
Enter Valid Date Range for WFH Tab
Click on Export Options Option for WFH Tab
Click on Print Option for WFH Tab
Click on Copy Option for WFH Tab
Click on Excel Option for WFH Tab
Verify PDF option for WFH Tab
Verify Number of Entries displayed for WFH Tab
Enter WFH Period Name in Search Box for WFH Tab
Sort columns for WFH Tab
Page Next for WFH Tab
Page Previous for WFH Tab
